label: AB2_cF96_227_e_cf-001
title: NiTi$_{2}$ Structure
comments: We have used the fact that all vectors of the form $(0,\pm a/2,\pm a/2)$, $(\pm a/2,0,\pm a/2)$, and $(\pm a/2,\pm a/2,0)$ are primitive vectors of the face-centered cubic lattice to simplify the positions of some atoms in both lattice and Cartesian coordinates.
